0100101011011110 1010101100111100 1 -> sum: 1111011000011011, cout: 0
0000011011001110 1011011100011110 1 -> sum: 1011110111101101, cout: 0
1111110010101000 1011011010001100 1 -> sum: 1011001100110101, cout: 1

0101111101010011 0101110010000001 0 -> sum: 1011101111010100, cout: 0
0011000101110000 1000000010111000 1 -> sum: 1011001000101001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
